envyami 155645201818 "2017-01-09 23:29:22 GMT" http://envyami.tumblr.com/post/155645201818/roadrat-master-post "cookiesateme:  rabbitvswonderland:  rabbitvswonderland:  Iâ€™ve been wanting to make this list for a while now
column2: because whenever someone asks me why Iâ€™m shipping roadrat and why I think theyâ€™re canon (confirmed or not)
column3: I always wish I could just send them one link.  So here goes (feel free to add more if you think somethingâ€™s missing)! 1) They hardly ever appear apartIn all the official art
column6: Junkrat and Roadhog almost always appear together. The other Overwatch characters will appear alone or with varying people
column7: but the junkers are always together. 2) They have matching/linked skinsAs far as I know
column8: Junkrat and Roadhog are the only characters to have matching skins (Junkenstein and Junkensteinâ€™s Monster) Please correct me if Iâ€™m wrong here! 3) Voice line developmentThey used to have a voice line exchange that would go: JR: You hook â€˜em
column9: Iâ€™ll cook â€˜em.RH: Shut up. But now the line goes: RH: Iâ€™ll hook â€˜emâ€¦JR: And Iâ€™ll cook â€˜em! (x) 4) Matching Christmas spraysJunkrat and Roadhog now have a Christmas-themed spray showing the two junkers fistbumping while sipping drinks together on the beach. 5) They vacation/have fun togetherIn the Overwatch comic â€œReflectionsâ€ we get to see what the Overwatch characters do for Christmas. Junkrat and Roadhog are seen having the time of their lives racing around in a car: 6) They have a (super gay) theme songWhen the comic was released
column10: Twitter user biscuitzombie asked the official OW Twitter which song the junkers were playing in their car
column11: and OW responded with â€œDown Underâ€ by Men at Work. It was quickly discovered that the song contains at least one reference to gay sex. 7) They exchange Christmas presentsAs part of Roadhogâ€™s Christmas skin
column12: his gun suddenly bore the label â€œFrom: Junkratâ€ and in a piece of art tweeted out by the official OW Twitter account
column13: Junkrat can be seen unwrapping a t-shirt with a pachimari print
column14: which Roadhog is known to love: 8) They are each otherâ€™s loved oneWhen launching the â€œReflectionsâ€ comic
column15: the official OW Twitter tweeted out: â€œJoin our heros as they head home for the holidays and celebrate the season with their loved ones: Junkrat and Roadhog are clearly celebrating together
column16: ergoâ€¦ loved ones!These were all I could think of
column17: but please add more if Iâ€™ve missed some!  Additions (thank you to everyone who contributed!) 9) Coming outOn National Coming Out Day
column18: Blizzard posted a picture of Junkenstein and his monster with the caption:Â â€œFind some who looks at you like Junkenstein looks at his monsterâ€. 10) Whoâ€™s the top?In-game
column19: when a Junkrat kills a Roadhog
column21: Â â€œGuess we know whoâ€™s really on top
column22: donâ€™t we?â€ and itâ€™s pretty hard to imagine that the writers didnâ€™t know double meaning ofÂ â€œtopâ€. 11) Junker ChristmasOn December 25th 2016
column23: the official Overwatch Twitter posted this picture: Itâ€™s not an official Overwatch/Blizzard artist
column24: but since itâ€™s been posted by an official Overwatch account
column25: itâ€™s fair to conclude that they at worst approve of it and at best consider it canon. So
column26: the junkers celebrate Christmas together <3  Wasnâ€™t there something about roadhogs badges on his vest in his original skin too? Like
column27: they were signifiers amongst gays/bikers for safe sex
column28: etc.? Iâ€™ll have to find the source cause I remember someone asking an actual biker about it and confirming this. " False text
